website_summaries.verdict: This easily fluffed pillow contains millions of microfibres and a "pillow-in-pillow" design, making it an adaptive choice regardless of your sleep position.
pros: 2.5 cc gusset allows for comfort and proper neck alignment
Many reports of reduced neck and back pain with regular use
cons: May not work for consumers who prefer firm pillows
Price falls on the higher end of the scale

customer_reviews.title: Great for some
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made pillow. I am a back and side sleeper and this pillow is comfortable but it is way too thick for for my personal taste. There is a pillow inside the pillow so you can separate and wash which is neat. I gave the pillow to another family member and they love it. They stated it helped with their acid reflux by keeping their head raised. I recommend it if you prefer a thick lofty pillow.
customer_reviews.author: robtay7

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This pillow was the epitome of unsupportive. At first you think it will be nice because of how soft it seems, however, this is the pillow’s downfall. This pillow is so soft and squishy that when I woke up in the morning my head and neck were in the most uncomfortable position I could imagine. Do not buy this pillow unless you want to wake up with a headache and neck ache every single morning. I tried this pillow every night for 3 nights and it did not get better. Worst three nights of my neck’s life.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't believe a apillow could help you sleep so much
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I gave these to each other for Christmas. I have a lot of neck problems, he just doesn't always sleep well. These pillows are amazing, we both sleep so much better. I cannot believe how it has relieved me from waking up with a crick in my neck. I sleep deeper and I love the way this cradles my head but supports my neck. We didn't buy sooner because of the cost, but it is worth every penney!
customer_reviews.author: Connie Lovell

customer_reviews.title: Good not Great
customer_reviews.text: A little over priced for a pillow. If you like super softer pillows and less firm, this is your product!
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: More comfortable than the foam filled pillow I replaced the Casper ...
customer_reviews.text: More comfortable than the foam filled pillow I replaced the Casper for .... seems to be getting lumpy now that it’s been used several times. Not sure I would purchase another one.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.text: Got one a year ago as a gift loved it! Was so excited to get a new one today! It's not the same- very soft no support and smaller! Middle pic is new one old one on the right.
customer_reviews.author: tschutz75

customer_reviews.title: It looks great, but it's just an oversized pillow with no support. It heats up quickly.

customer_reviews.author: Jack Warren III

customer_reviews.title: Supports well your neck
customer_reviews.text: The Casper Pillow (King) is so nice, the rumors are true :-D Casper the friendly ghost hasn't come by ;-) And it nice to have a brand with my personal name on it :-D
customer_reviews.author: Casper Carl Sørensen

customer_reviews.title: Not Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Neither my husband nor I liked this pillow. It is too puffy and lumpy and wasn't supportive for either his side sleeping or my back sleeping. Both of us had an increase in neck and back pain after using this pillow. I would not recommend this to any type of sleeper. Now I've spent a lot of money on a pillow I can't use.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Dudley

customer_reviews.title: Breathing with comfort.
customer_reviews.text: I almost died to spend so much money on a pillow. I worked in a mall and at a gym and all the members would talk about this pillow. I was in desperate need to refresh mine and I am also a restless sleeper. So I bit the bullet and bought just one to try it out. It’s so soft, so clean, and very comfortable. I’m saving up to now buy two more. I am now considering replacing my mattress too.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Not Fat But Good
customer_reviews.text: The concept of a dual pillow design (one inside the other) is not just a gimmick. It works well to temper the consistency and provide both loft and support. What you are wondering, of course, is, are all those reviewers who say that it is "flat," correct? Well, the Casper is definitely on the side of "compressible." However, it is also infinitely malleable and provides both cusion and leverage depending on how you fluff and position it. The bottom line is, if you're looking for an inflated, bouncy pillow that will raise your head 11-inches above your shoulders, this is not for you. But for a very comfortable, well-constructed, long-term sleeper...I say this is a terrific choice.
customer_reviews.author: Road Warrior

customer_reviews.title: Just like any other pillow; Head & neck support is not that great.
customer_reviews.text: I was soo excited for this pillow since I wore out my $12 extra firm target pillow. I was searching for head and neck support more than anything. All of my friends are obsessed with it and the reviews were amazing. I couldn’t say no to this $60 + pillow. However, it’s just like any other pillow. Definitely not worth the price. It is quite soft&fluffy but my head eventually sinks into it and I find that my neck is aching during the middle of the night and I end up sleeping on my arm for support, then having to add another pillow under this one.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Luis

customer_reviews.title: Great Pillow...If You Like Them Flat, Unsupportive, and Expensive!
customer_reviews.text: My wife can sleep on anything, but her older Serta memory foam pillow needs replaced. She tried this Casper pillow one night, and hated it. Appears well made, but it’s like a hotel pillow that goes flat as a pancake, and squished out the back from under her head. I can’t believe all the positive reviews. This one does no better than a $5 pillow from your local big-box store. This one’s going back.
customer_reviews.author: ChesterMan85

customer_reviews.title: like sleeping on a cloud!
customer_reviews.text: these casper pilows are amazing.Super soft and definitely love how they are always cool temperature. they are super squishy and soft, i would have added a little bit of firmness to it, as they make you sink in a little. but overall, great pillows! if you want a firm pillow, this wouldnt be the right one for you. if you like super soft pillows, best product ever. if you want a good balance between firm and soft, i would suggest have a thin pillow underneath this one to have best comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Alissa A

customer_reviews.title: Talk sleep to me!!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried every pillow you can think of... my neck and back always hurt when I wake up. I found myself constantly tossing and turning, never getting a full night sleep. When you’re a mom sleep is important. I can’t lie, I was extremely hesitant to buy his product! I’m debated between this and another product and ultimately decided to give Casper a shot. BEST DECISION EVER! I find myself always able to get comfortable, never tossing and turning, always sleeping through the night!! It’s the right amount of soft to firm ratio. If you want a good quality pillow give this one a shot. It even has a guarantee! You will not regret.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: My orders got picked the day UPS brought 2 others I was expecting.
customer_reviews.text: Was not comfortable to me, could not sleep with them but I had surgery several years ago and that may of had something to do with because the surgery was on my neck at the time. So being honest that could of had a lot to do with me not sleeping on them! A UPS Guy came by my home Nov. 11 and picked them up. He said he did not have the order to pick them up but he took them anyway because he said an adult had to be here and later that day I had to go to Doctor Appointment so UPS took both boxes with him,2 different orders, Casper Pillows & Food Sealer. Thanks, EBT 678-227-9806
customer_reviews.author: Ellene Tankersley

customer_reviews.title: so far so good

I was not having to wake up and adjust the pillow numerous time. I hope this continues. Right now I'm very impressed. I am a side sleeper and it gives good support.
customer_reviews.author: H. Kenkel

customer_reviews.title: Just relax and enjoy
customer_reviews.text: Funny story I was actually having a one night stand and I shocked to see her pillows were one of the best she just said they came with the bed so I decided to look them iffy about ordering pillows I can feel but wow better than down honestly just wow I love the feel truly pillows rethought it was overall a great product one of the best pillows healthier than tempurpedic too so that a big plus enjoy it should pillow of the year
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: World class pillow - incredible
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used a lot of pillows in my life. This one is the best. It was cool straight out of the box. The pillow in pillow design is genius and you can absolutely feel yourself drifting off the moment you set your head down. Incredible product. If I had the space, I’d fill a room with these and never leave. I love this pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Lacks Support
customer_reviews.text: This could be a good pillow if you could make it firmer. I sleep on my side and I have bulged and herniated disks in my neck which will require surgery. This pillow provides no support...you simply sink too low in the pillow. My wife, on the other hand, sleeps more on her back and likes a pillow that is medium soft which this pillow is. It's too bad you can't add additional filling to this pillow. It is well constructed, but it needs more support.
customer_reviews.author: Chip's picks

customer_reviews.title: Game changer for me
customer_reviews.text: I sleep on my stomach but my doctor advised me to sleep on my back due my back pain. No matter how hard I tried, I always ended up on my stomach. The FIRST night with this Casper pillow, I laid down on my back. It felt like my head was laying on a cloud... supported, but almost like I was floating. I slept all night on my back! This pillow was instantly noticeable as being top quality and top comfort. I'll report back if this changes over the next few weeks. NOTE: Fluff the pillow every few days to "puff it up".
customer_reviews.author: SGreenstreet

customer_reviews.title: Gets better with time, but not as good as the Casper Mattress.
customer_reviews.text: I know pillows are a personal preference, but I adore the Casper Mattress so I was surprised that this pillow didn’t quite hit the mark for me. While it does get better with time, I still wish it was a bit fuller & could be full/supportive enough without me having to condense it each night. So you understand what I mean: If you lie on it flat, your head will almost sink to the level of your mattress. #sidesleeper
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: A must!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m on a quest to have a very comfortable bed. So I made my husband get us the Casper mattress and I ordered the pillow soon after. SO worth the price! I’m a side sleeper and this pillow is so supportive yet like a cloud. My husband keeps asking to “borrow” mine (3 nights in a row now lol) and he’s extremely picky with pillows! Next we’re getting the sheets!
customer_reviews.author: RaShod Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Best pillow I’ve ever had
customer_reviews.text: Have had a lot of pillows including the tv pillows but none measures up to this one. It’s a bit more expensive than I usually pay for a pillow but worth it. I was a bit concerned when it arrived all compressed in a tube but after openingit, it fluffed right up and keeps its shape. Just the right firmness and support, very comfortable, makes for a better nights sleep. Only ordered it because of a recommendation from a friend, very happy I did
customer_reviews.author: bobcat46

customer_reviews.title: No support

Almost all of my (much) cheaper pillows are more supportive. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Heather G.

customer_reviews.title: No more neck and shoulder pain

Prior to purchasing I have been struggling with neck and right shoulder pains. I assumed it was from work but the chiropractor mentioned the pillow could be a major contributor to my discomfort. This pillow is the prefect height and adjusts to your body. It’s not too high or too long. After a week or so, I noticed my shoulder and neck pain had significantly decreased! It works great for sleeping on your back or side. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: C. So

customer_reviews.title: Used and non original pillow. Waste of money.

I can’t recommend this pillow at all.

I bought her another set of pillows she liked much better and took the Casper back home and tried it out. Not enough support for me either, but the finish is very nice and smooth. So put it on the bed in the guest room and my cat loves to sleep on it. If you are looking for a nice pillow for a spoiled cat, I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: chloe46774

customer_reviews.title: Not great

I can feel my whole hand through the pillow if I have it resting under it. If I stack two on top of eachother it’s okay, but then my neck hurts because it’s in a weird position.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: This pillow changed my life
customer_reviews.text: I haven't really ventured out with different pillow brands, I usually have just gone with the Ikea pillows. Ikea pillows suck, they flatten easily and take forever to retract back to normal. This casper pillow however, changed my life. I often wake up in the most awkwardest positions and since I got this pillow, there is no pain in my neck from waking up. It's so comfortable, I plan on getting more eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Thara

customer_reviews.title: Buy two!
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from multitude of headache disorders including migraine, cluster, and tension headaches. This pillow has helped in alleviating waking up with such headaches. I have gone through a great many pillows on the market at significant cost. This pillow is worth EVERY penny.
customer_reviews.author: Norell

customer_reviews.title: Very different from the standard size

I would not recommend wasting you money on these. A $20 pillow from TJ Max is the same quality level for a lot lower cost. I will attempt to return the pillows I bought.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flattens quickly

customer_reviews.title: Best pillow ever

However, I finally have a comfortable well made fluffy pillow with awesome support and it’s still going well. Recommend anyone who needs a great pillow
customer_reviews.author: Berlynda

Really frustrating because I don’t know how to return this, it won’t fit in the box it arrived in.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Mc

customer_reviews.title: Comfy as can be
customer_reviews.text: This is my first foray into premium bed stuff and I am pretty jazzed. I will say this, I used to be a two pillow sleeper and two of these pillows is wwaaayyyyy too much. So keep that in mind when purchasing multiple pillows

I don’t believe that it was Amazons fault I think it was our usps.
customer_reviews.author: Sean K Anuskewicz

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable

customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: The magic is in the fluffing technique
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is amazing. It's nice and fluffy, which was a little concerning at first because I like my pillow to be a tad firm, and at first it seemed too flat. When I looked online at reviews I discovered the brand posted a video specifically about how to fluff the pillow and let me tell you... This was a game changer. Now it's fluffy, yet supportive. Moldable but a bit firm. And when it gets a little flat again you just need to fluff it up and you're good to go once more!
customer_reviews.author: Kymbee8

customer_reviews.title: Good pillow. Will recommend.
customer_reviews.text: After getting a new mattress this August I decided to order some pillows. I’ve been sleeping on my Casper pillow for a few weeks and I’m very pleased. I always start by ordering a single pillow and then purchase the subsequent 3 if I am pleased. So far the pillow doesn’t overheat, seems to hold shape overnight, it isn’t over/under filled (though it’s but super plush/fluffy), and provides adequate support for a stomach/side sleeper. I ordered another one.
customer_reviews.author: Ieva Vashkus

customer_reviews.title: Super honest review
customer_reviews.text: Well this is the third pillow i bough within a month to try and realizing what i really need to sleep without pain So far not bad but is not as comfortable as they say Anyway i will keep it until i get used to it i guess
customer_reviews.author: Shuffle muffel

customer_reviews.title: Finally found my fav pillow
customer_reviews.text: Can't tell you how many pillows I've bought over the years. At least 30 different ones. Finally found one that feels amazing in every way and can also be used as a hugger pillow between the legs. Just bought 3 more, so now I have 2 standards and 2 king size. I know pillows are a very personal thing but this one is deff worth a try
customer_reviews.author: Tony Rustlips

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good pillow
customer_reviews.text: I'm a sucker for paying this much for a pillow this is true. I usually can't sleep on pillows that are not on the flat side, but I sleep fine on this, and my shoulder pains aren't as severe. It's not a miracle and wasn't exactly what I was looking for, but I'm also pretty happy I got it. It definitely has some height, so it would be perfect for someone who prefers that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Pillow
customer_reviews.text: I am very picky about pillows, softness and support. I'm a side sleeper and have a difficult time finding a pillow that's soft and supportive and lasts more than 3 nights before it's flat. The Casper pillow is a little pricey but it's sooo worth it! I went from getting a new pillow every month or 2, to having this for almost 6 months and it's still just like the day I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Support
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pillow. Delivers on its claim to fit any sleeping position. Outside really is soft and plush while the core is more firm for that comfortable support. My only complaint is that it's not as easy to keep fluffy as they say it is. Mine started going flat about after 4 months of fluffing every other day, if not daily. However, I was able to revive it to its original fluffiness by putting in the dryer (no heat) for 30 minutes with wool dryer balls.
customer_reviews.author: Brendon

customer_reviews.title: High-Quality, Versatile Pillow with No Drawbacks
customer_reviews.text: First experienced the Casper pillow in American Airlines' Flagship business class, and had no objection when my spouse suggested later that we tried it at home. Unsurprisingly, it's even better in a real bed than on a plane. As I get older, I get pickier about pillows, but I've got no complaints about this one. It really works for every position without issue. I'd definitely recommend it to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: J5W0lf

customer_reviews.title: After 2 months, you couldn't pay me to give it to you.
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is expensive, but as with most expensive things, you pay the difference in quality. Highly recommended if you are suffering from uncomfortable sleep or neck pain.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Adams

customer_reviews.title: Love it; thick but melt-able
customer_reviews.text: I love that this is thick enough to bunch up under your neck and give you a good neck-roll situation, but it's also soft enough to comfortably melt into this every night without thinking it's too thick or bulky. Best perk though: flipping it for the COOLER side when you need a change-up!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel B

customer_reviews.title: Get it.
customer_reviews.text: Great pillow. I bought one from Target to try out. A week later I had to get another one and ordered from Amazon. Like they say fluffy but yet supportive. The one from Target came in a fancy tube and the one I received from Amazon came in a boring Casper branded cardboard box. As far as I can tell they are identical.
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.text: Have to say it’s a little below my expectation. I thought it’s the combination of foam inside with a puffy softy outside. But it’s not. It’s just a cotton pillow in a bigger cotton pillow. At least that’s how I felt. And when I put my head on it, it tends to slip away from me. That says something about the softness, because it won’t tuck my head in. That being said. It’s not uncomfortable. It’s still above average soft and has this silky touch smoothness. But is it worth the price I am not sure.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

This pillow solves all that. Seriously everything I could want in a pillow. I've had it for one week so far and am so happy with my decision to purchase and give this pillow a try.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey b

customer_reviews.title: Love this pillow!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first pillow that I can honestly say I absolutely love! It’s everything I always wanted in a pillow and could never find! It’s cushy and comfy and provides just the right amount of support while being totally cool for perfect sleep! Love this pillow!
customer_reviews.author: badkitty4evs

customer_reviews.title: Great support for the neck
customer_reviews.text: Finally a pillow that is not too soft, yet not too hard. Just right. I've been battling with neck issues with uncomfortable pillows I've been using. This will be my 7th type of pillow bought over the last year, all ranging in price. I've had this pillow for almost a month and no issues with my neck being out of alignment. This Casper pillow was also referred to me by two other people so I gave it a try. Glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly
customer_reviews.text: YAHHS The pillow of all pillows. Gave to my man for a gift and I’m over here trying to get an edge of it. Pillow heaven. Neck heaven. Casper heaven. Bravo!

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow
customer_reviews.text: I am a side sleeper, and this is a really great pillow that is soft, but not too soft. It keeps my neck right at the right height. Sometimes I wish it were down feather, but all things considered, its a great cheaper alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! Took a little time to adjust I hate changing my pillows even when they go flat then change to a new one that I hate it and go back to my old one. customer_reviews.title: Excellent!

customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Nice pillow. I really like it for when I am laying in bed and watching tv. It really supports your neck. I like that you can wash the pillow to fluff it and bring it back to life.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: In love with this pillow
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow to try because my previously one I had was a temperpedic and I had it a few years and needed a replacement. This is very comfortable. It does not goes flat every night before I go to bed I fluff it and it go back to normal the way when you first bought it. I like it how it can put it in the washing machine and after that can put it in the dryer which I put a tennis ball to dry to it did not deform it dry up the same way it came in. I sleep better in it now.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cocopuff

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pillow!!
customer_reviews.text: Finally!!!!! I have purchased so many pillows and none of them help my neck and shoulders. I broke down and ordered this after seeing it on display in Target. It was pricey and I was skeptical. I love this pillow!!! No more pain, just the right amount of support and plushness.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Pritchett

customer_reviews.title: All the reviews are true!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is the best pillow. Was a little leary at first because it is very thick but it must have memory foam because I slept like a bebe!
customer_reviews.author: Gale Blackstock

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and comfy to rest on!
customer_reviews.text: I'm normally a somewhat firm pillow person but using this soft pillow for awhile now has changed my mind on how comfortable some softer pillows can be! Great to sleep on and easy to maintain! It's a little pricey as far as pillows go which is why I gave it 4 stars but if you can get it on sale it's worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Kaleb

customer_reviews.title: WORST PILLOW I'VE EVER OWNED
customer_reviews.text: I'd give this zero stars if I could. This is honestly the worst pillow I've ever used. There's no support whatsoever, your head falls directly through to the bed. You'd be better off not even using a pillow! I just cannot believe that this is a Casper - I had SUCH high hopes for it. It's the WORST.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Plush comfy pillow
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a plush pillow for a very long time and finally decided to splurge on a pillow. I have Casper's duvet and absolutely love it. I can use two pillows (which I normally prefer) and sleep like a baby. The issue I have with most pillows is that they go flat very fast usually within 30-90 days. Will update on that in the future.
customer_reviews.author: VanillaSyrup

customer_reviews.title: Yes I love it
customer_reviews.text: I was so unhappy with Mr Pillows that I started looking for something else and this one fits the bill. Yes it is pricey but I am so happy that I get the best sleep I have gotten in years. It works well with my CPAP mask as well.
customer_reviews.author: WA-GA

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again and again
customer_reviews.text: I was so skeptical to fall into the scheme of advertisements on Instagram for this pillow but I’m so glad I gave it a try. Given it’s probably not for everyone I can honestly say I feel like I really missed out on some good sleep all this time ! This pillow is not too soft not too hard just like the advertisements say my neck feels supported and I feel so refreshed ! I was not given anything for this review- I would absolutely pay full price for this pillow if I had to.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Best every postion sleeper pillow
customer_reviews.text: I have tried lots of pillows even the famous MyPillow series and nothing would work for me. Since having my son I went from a stomach always sleeper to every which way sleeper. I would always wake up with neck pain and/or headaches. The Casper pillow truly has been perfect. I never have pain, I am cool and it provides great support but the dual pillow aspect lets it feel soft and fluffy too. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley A. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Perfect amount of suppirt.
customer_reviews.text: Tried a 2/3 size Casper pillow on a business class flight from Hawaii- fell in love. Ordered the nap size when I got home, then ordered a full size. Perfect amount of support for this side sleeper!
customer_reviews.author: S.Betts

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but....
customer_reviews.text: I don't always wake up with no neck pain. Admittedly, I thought I was getting a great deal on the foam Casper pillow so the pillow itself wasn't the item I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Lumpy
customer_reviews.text: This has become a lump mess over the last year. Regularly fluffing / trying to beat it to death doesn't help. The stuffing has clumped together and is no longer redistributable. This was great for a few months, but it's become a lesson in miserable frustration. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best.
customer_reviews.text: I can’t count the number of pillows I have purchased and not really liked. My son recommended his pillow and he was right. It I These are the Best I have never spent this much for a pillow but I’m so glad I did. Thanks for a wonderful night’s sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Long Time Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: No support
customer_reviews.text: What an awful pillow. I couldn’t even make it through one night with this. The pillow looks very plump but collapses as soon as I lay my head on it. Not even close to the firmness a side sleeper needs. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: J.W. McGhee

customer_reviews.title: Great sleep every night!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is perfect. You can fluff it up every night so it feels brand new every time. This is the second one I purchased, the first one lasted over 2 years before I started to feel a little flat. Will buy another one in 2 more years for sure
customer_reviews.author: craig

customer_reviews.title: Machine Washable
customer_reviews.text: Pillow needs fluffing on a regular basis, but the machine washability paired with support of the pillow make this pillow worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: PonchoLady

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pillow
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is quite possible the best pillow I have ever owned. It is soft and fluffy while remaking form and supportive. The quality of my sleep has increased ten fold and I wake up without the neck pain I have suffered from for years. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The 2020 of Pillows
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the worst pillow I have ever owned. Absolutely rubbish. The support is not as the product was eloquently worded. Plus it talks back when I curse if out. A superior pillow is the Coop one you can fill or flatten as you see fit. Now I have this expensive pillow and sleepless nights. It’s the 2020 of pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Kristopher Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Using half the pillow and it works for me
customer_reviews.text: I first washed the pillow and then tried sleeping on it. The pillow is too tall for me and hurt my neck, so I took off the outer pillow and just sleep on the inner pillow and really like it. The support is firm enough for my neck, but it's not at all too firm for my face and ears. It is pretty squishy and I have to fluff it up after every night, but that's ok. It stays supportive through the night. I sleep on both sides and my back, and this pillow works in all positions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Pillow I've ever slept on
customer_reviews.text: Great pillow, price is steep however your sleep will thank you with how easy it is to drift away on this pillow. Easy to sleep on in almost all positions, very breathable can get a little warm at night but great otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: It's like sleeping on a cloud!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I've used this for a few days since I've gotten it and it's like sleeping on a cloud! It's got the right amount of support for when I sleep on both my side or back, but it's soft and squishy, too. I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Good pillow
customer_reviews.text: Order this for my son. He loves it! It so soft and puffy. I don’t know why the packaging is different, I just received from the box, not cylinder like others. Overall it’s a good pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Rene

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pillow
customer_reviews.text: Best pillow I’ve owned! Husband has had one for some time and after experiencing unrelenting neck pain I bought one as well. Neck pain is gone and I sleep like a baby.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Very average, A bit overpriced and overhyped.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because I saw one too many casper ads and I was looking for a new pillow at the time. I dont think it was worth the money, I only used it for 3-4 months before realizing that it was completely the same as the one I had before. They feel just like stock regular pillows that come with bedding sets only with fancier packaging and logo.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin C

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Best pillow I have ever used. I’ve tried so many different pillows and this one is worth every penny!!! First night I slept on it surprised me.. so comfortable. LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.author: Msaldana

customer_reviews.title: Good, firm pillow
customer_reviews.text: This pillow maintains it's shape/loft but still has a plush feel because of the pillow-in-pillow construction. I also like how substantial it feels, and how easy it is to fluff.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I am a side sleeper and have been dealing with neck pains for a while now. I was worried about paying a lot for a pillow that I would be disappointed with, but this pillow has been incredible. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Byrd

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Best money I have ever spent on a pillow. Ready to buy two more. they keep their shape and are super comfortable regardless of whether you are a back or side sleeper.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Way to hard, my neck was killing me from sleeping on this pillow. I have since taken the inside pillow out and use both pieces separately. Comfy to use both watching tv, then when I sleep I toss one piece on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: S. M. H.

customer_reviews.title: Hypo-allergenic & soft but firm enough!
customer_reviews.text: Best king-pillow I’ve ever owned! Have 4 on my new Casper Wave Cal-King! Sleep like on a cloud!
customer_reviews.author: GLENN-COLIN

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: After 4 months, this pillow is a complete disappointment. As much as I try to get it fluffed up, it doesn’t work and it feels flat. There is no support and it feels like it is causing me more neck pain than my old pillow. Don’t waste your money!!
customer_reviews.author: Rkm

customer_reviews.title: Nice/supportive
customer_reviews.text: Big pillow perfect for propping myself up at night tho it's moved out the way for sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. K

product_meta.title: Casper Sleep Pillow for Sleeping, Standard, White
product_meta.description: Size:StandardWe invented a unique pillow-in-pillow design that’s built to satisfy all sleepers. We slept on over 60 different kinds of pillows from around the world to find the best fill types. Our pillow’s buoyant core and plush, resilient, outer layer join forces to support all sleeping positions. Filled with nearly a billion microfibers, the pillow is adaptive and will respond to your movements throughout the night. Complete with a breathable cotton cover, the pillow is easily machine washable and dryable.
feature_bullets: 100% cotton cover features a breathable percale weave which increases airflow, so you’re always sleeping cool.
Innovative pillow-in-pillow design packed with microfiber fill, provides both support and comfort.
Removable, machine-washable outer layer for easy cleaning.
2" gusset serves as the backbone of our pillow’s construction. This allows for better neck alignment and an evenly distributed fill.
Resistant to clumping, meaning it can bounce back with just a quick fluff. Packaging may vary
